snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 16 points and made a go-ahead 3-point-play with 5.1 seconds left as Dallas won at home over Boston.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Dallas Mavericks beat Boston Celtics, 90-85; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 16 points and made a go-ahead 3-point-play with 5.1 seconds left as Dallas won at home over Boston.

headline.seo: Dirk Nowitzki Leads Mavericks Past the Celtics
headline.main: Nowitzki Sinks Celtics; Nets Fall in Denver
headline.print_headline: Nowitzki Sinks Celtics; Nets Fall in Denver
